website_summaries.verdict: This clean-touch ink handprint set lets you display a handprint AND a footprint, as well as a favorite picture.
pros: Clean-touch ink pad means no messy ink on your child's hands and feet
Pad and paper sized best for newborns
cons: Some kits arrive with ink pad somewhat dried out, so be sure to check it

customer_reviews.title: Used kit arrived
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a new product, upon opening discovered that it was used and didn't include the acid free paper cards for the prints and the ink press has already been used, enough so that there's no ink left in places. Now I need to order a separate kit to get my baby's prints. This is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: S. Sparkman

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: First frame came damaged but was quickly replaced. I love how easy it was to get my baby’s prints. The only downside is that the ink mat is a bit small even for my newborn’s handprint... I had to bunch his fingers together a bit so that they would fit without his thumb and pinkie being cut off. A bigger ink pad would help. I recommend taking prints when baby is sleeping - it makes it much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Washington

customer_reviews.title: Really just paying for the frame
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Frame is simple and clean. However, they should put some sort of film cover on the ink pad or something until it's ready to use. It just comes between two small cardboard pieces, and the ink side was stuck to one of them, so I pealed it off to find ink already transferred off.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use- beautiful frame!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! This is a quality frame and so easy to use. Beautiful as well. It was easy to transfer handprints and footprints onto the enclosed paper. They give you a few sheets in case you mess up. I even had some ink leftover and used it for the baby milestone book. It was an easy transfer with no mess. No inking the baby’s hand or foot. What a pleasure!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: The cutest keepsake
customer_reviews.text: I bought this before my baby was born and used it at about 3 weeks. I adore how it turned out! The foot was pretty easy, I did that on my own. My little one is a little stubborn and kept the hands balled up in a fist so I needed help to get the hand print. They give a couple extra papers for trial and error so I had plenty of practice to get it right. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Super hard to get quality footprints and handprints because newborns pull their hands and feet in etc BUT the finished product when you get hand prints and foot prints is so cute!! The only thing I wish was it had printed on the front a place to write in their name; their birth weight, height, and head circumference. I recommend using a test piece of paper first but once you get the hang of it, it’s been pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: HCF

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. The frame is nice. I love how it looks with the picture inside. It's SUPER easy to use and best of all NO MESS. I just wish they had one extra ink pad and some extra white papers because with newborns it's hard to get their little hands to uncurl so we had a couple tries to get it right and ran out of paper. Overall- LOVE this and wish I would've bought it for my first born.
customer_reviews.author: doodlz81

customer_reviews.title: Great frame, hard to use ink pads
customer_reviews.text: This frame is cute, but the ink pads are very difficult to use. I tried making the hand and foot prints when my daughter was asleep, but even the slightest movement causes a big smear on the print. I bought extra ink pads just in case, but still didn’t come out with great prints.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Package missing ink pad
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two frames. One of the frames did not come with the ink pad and the pieces of paper were just printer paper. It also had an ink smear on the front of the frame. The other frame had an ink pad and 2 pieces of card stock for the prints. We used the ink pad and cardboard for the second frame, but it didn’t come out that great. It would have been better if they gave you more pieces of card stock. Giving it two stars because of the frame without the ink & card stock and because there’s not much room for error.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This baby handprint / footprint product is very easy to use and works well. Instructions come along with the frame and are pretty easy to follow. We had great success with this and are very happy we bought this. We also like the fact that this frame provides you with a few papers, in case you mess up. Additionally, the frame itself is nice and we appreciate the fact that there's a place to add a photo in between the prints. Definitely worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: CollegeGrad08Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Baby prints
customer_reviews.text: Third time was a charm. Ordered this item and the ink pad arrived pressed in one side. Whem doing baby prints it left an empty circle due to not having ink. Ordered a replacement and the frame arrived cracked and it did not include the ink pad. The third one I received was brand new and was able to capture my babies prints. She is two months old, I recommend doing them while baby is sleeping and using the small cardboard it comes with to put under the paper when doing babies print. It made it sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: Defective- All 3 purchased @ different times
customer_reviews.text: We purchased three of these, one for us and two for gifts. I purchased them all at different times and they all still had the same issue- the ink pad was unusable and dry. I wouldn't recommend this product. Also, they didn't provide many extra papers, so good luck if you mess up!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: Buy a different brand. This one doesn't come with the ink pads it comes with 2 very thin plastic paper that has ink on it. Another one I bought from a different company came with an actual ink pad. Plus my frame came broken in the corner and it was well packages
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Keepsake
customer_reviews.text: I love this frame! It’s a perfect keepsake. I did my baby’s prints at two weeks old and the ink pad was plenty big for a hand/foot. The silver lining around openings is a elegant touch. Would recommend for parents and/or a gift for parents.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: They need to provide more practice paper
customer_reviews.text: I finally got this down... after 4 tries (all the paper and not a good print). Now I have to order a refill pack :( They need more clear instructions... do not try when baby is sleeping as some suggest, I think it needs to be flush and flat on a surface! I got a lot of ink around my baby's hand on the paper when trying without something behind it.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Can only be hung
customer_reviews.text: Love this frame and the ink kit is very easy to use. It won’t get your little ones hands or feet dirty. I wish this frame came in more color options. Also this frame can only be hung, it doesn’t come with the back part to let it stand on a table surface, it only has the little bracket to hang it. The overall quality is very good, I would recommend this frame and kit.
customer_reviews.author: Dez629

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea. The little plates that are used...comes with 4 circular plastic plates...were scratched so when cooked a bunch of scratches appeared...not nice and clear like the example shows AND the ink was missing. Luckily we had some purple ink to use.
customer_reviews.author: Holly A. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Ink pad was dried out
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for my son and it came out so cute so after I had my daughter I thought I’d buy the same one for her so they could have matching ones. We took it out to do her prints last night and no matter how hard we pushed her little foot down onto the ink pad, her prints just came out super light. They are wayyy less light than my son’s came out. I’m guessing the ink pad was just dried out but I’m super bummed! Her prints do not look good at all 😭
customer_reviews.author: Danica G.

customer_reviews.title: Received used item.
customer_reviews.text: I received it used! The ink card had a baby hand and foot print all over it. The cards were smudged. I spent three weeks waiting for a unusable item.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Do this as newborn!
customer_reviews.text: Was not easy to get a baby foot or hand print; but that would be any method. What I didn’t like is that that ink pad are not large enough to fit a whole foot or hand; my baby was 2.5 months when we did this so maybe doing it when she was newborn would have been better. Great concept!
customer_reviews.author: ekilby

customer_reviews.title: Frame arrived cracked beyond repair
customer_reviews.text: I should have opened this immediately after receiving it - I ordered it right after my daughter was born six months ago. We have the same one for her older brother and wanted one for her, too. I just opened it up tonight to do her prints and the frame is cracked beyond repair. So, so disappointed. This was supposed to be a treasured keepsake. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Barb M

customer_reviews.title: Easy and clean to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and good quality. We purchased one from another retailer for our first child and decided to get another for our second. You just push their little hand into the "ink" page and their little prints come out perfectly. It's harder to handle their little hands than use this products. A must buy for all parents who don't want to get their little ines hands dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Griffin Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after a plaster version didn't come out the way I wanted. This was so easy to use, I liked that baby stayed clean. It was nice to have extra papers to practice with as it's difficult to make a newborn keep still even for a second.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita B.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fragile and easily damaged
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I went through the absolutely grueling task of getting my baby's prints for the cards only to have the frame break within a week of hanging it up on the wall. Frame is made of a weak cardboard that disintegrates when bumped even slightly. Please do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Michaele Kanczel

customer_reviews.title: Product okay
customer_reviews.text: I generally liked this product but the area to make my kids' prints were smaller than the size of their hands/feet, and I used it on my 6-month-old. Otherwise it is easy to use and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Charline Souffan

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was 13 months old when I made this ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was 13 months old when I made this and her foot and hand were a little to large to fit on the ink pad properly. Still turned out okay.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: print area is very small
customer_reviews.text: The print area is smaller than it appears on the picture. If you have a older or bigger baby, it's hard to fit the entire hand of feet on the print area.
customer_reviews.author: luke222

customer_reviews.title: tricky
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use , ink is hard to get on baby hands
customer_reviews.author: Jean Loynd

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something that was easy to use and reuse and this wasn’t as easy as they made it seem. Also my ink pad came with a botch in it which showed in the hand and foot prints. Definitely disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact frame I have for my son who is now almost 4 years old so I am excited to have the same from for my son who is due September .
customer_reviews.author: Woodrow Taliaferro

customer_reviews.title: Good for present
customer_reviews.text: Ink doesn't last for many prints. I bought an extra ink pad & used both & extra paper to get the wiggly baby's full prints.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for grandparents
customer_reviews.text: Our baby was born at 31 weeks and we wanted to capture his tiny hands and feet. It was really easy to use and we gifted it to our parents as a perfect keepsake
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use frame
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Was easy to use and didn’t need the extra paper it comes with surprisingly. I made sure baby was milk drunk before doing it so that probably is what helped the most lol. I cradle him stomach down with his legs/hands dangling downwards while my husband pressed his hand/foot on the ink pad. It was definitely a two person job 😁
customer_reviews.author: JLT

customer_reviews.title: Super happy with the result!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad it came with extra sheets for prints, because we definitely went through all of them trying to get a good image. It ended up looking very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Cracked twice
customer_reviews.text: Ordered corner was split Sent back got another Its split but not all the way through. Ink is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy W

customer_reviews.title: Super flimsy. multiple frames arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Bought three just in time for Christmas. All three had broken frames and were not suitable for gifts. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sean808080

customer_reviews.title: Cute. Great gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I had this exact item for my older child and wanted the same for my youngest. It’s mess free and worked great. Such a nice keepsake for the kids and they love looking at how small their feet and hands were. Great baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The glass comes out of the frame easily and the paper for the prints don't fit as nicely as the display picture. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: C.M

customer_reviews.title: Old ink pad
customer_reviews.text: Contents were as described except the ink pad. It was a mess free pad but the color was so faint that I had to buy a separate ink pad
customer_reviews.author: Cheikh N.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to do
customer_reviews.text: The inkless foot prints was amazing. We had tried with another set and it took forever to get the ink off. The prints came out perfect( as prefect as trying to keep a five month olds hands not to fist up) and it looks great hanging on our wall. Would recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Kari Buchheit

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to use it!
customer_reviews.text: A lot bigger than I expected and super cute! I ordered extra ink just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing. Frame broken.
customer_reviews.text: Frame cracked and the ink pad and paper to do the prints was missing!!!! Very upset!!! Opened the box today to capture the 1 month milestone of my daughter and completely disappointed. Product unusable!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B

customer_reviews.title: Love these keepsakes
customer_reviews.text: These frames are beautiful. Baby doesn't want to cooperate, I used both sides of all the spare cards trying to get a good print. Ended up using my own cardstock and finally got a good set. The no-mess ink pad that comes with it works great.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is really hard to use on a newborn and the ink is not strong at all you have to press really hard and even then it's not dark enough. I Do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: The Boys

customer_reviews.title: Easy use, pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty frame, first frame arrived broken was replaced quickly by manufacturer/amazon. Easy to use . Comes with 4 pieces of paper to allow for error
customer_reviews.author: nelson vargas

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Glass is kind of weak. But my girls like to look at their old hand print how much they have grown.
customer_reviews.author: Hyun

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my first baby and loved it!! No mess and worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Cristan Julian

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Product is straight forward and easy to use. No mess.

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Father's Day for my husband and it's very easy to use (as long as your baby semi cooperates lol) perfect keep sake of hand and foot prints
customer_reviews.author: xoxo

customer_reviews.title: So elegant
customer_reviews.text: I cannot wait to hang this up ! Such a beautiful piece for the nursery !!! We just painted his hands and feet and they look so adorable ! The frame is SO elegant!
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and baby stays clean!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was super fast and product was in perfect condition. Sooo happy I found a product where I don’t have to put ink on my newborns hands and feet! First try was a success. Would definitely purchase again for another family member or for a shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t even the item I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Was sent something that wasn’t even related to baby. Then I go back online to order it again. And now they’re wanting $15 for shipping and it was free shipping when I ordered the first time when I got the fork caddy instead!!
customer_reviews.author: cindy castellano

customer_reviews.title: Good quality of frame
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the feame but the way you put inside the foor/finger prints is not very convenient. So we had to use tape to fox them inside.... but still the frame is pretty good comparing to others and the price is good
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the ink transfer wasn’t the best. But it was okay! Still cute and a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Every pregnant women needs this!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best things ever for anyone with a baby on the way! Super easy to do. Very clean since NO Ink gets on. And the prints turn out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michellci B.

customer_reviews.title: Looove love love!
customer_reviews.text: 5/5 for sure! Came fairly quickly, really easy to use and of course, no mess! I even posted about it on Facebook I was so impressed. Can’t wait to hang it up!
customer_reviews.author: Karli Wills

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to use a sleeping baby works the best and if you have more paper there’s enough to do prints several times did set for mom and grandma and one for baby book.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: The quality is only ok but it is definitely easy to use and does look very cute. I love that it isn’t messy.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Super adorable frame for a baby
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and construction-so perfect for a baby gift!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cute but easy to rip
customer_reviews.text: Super cute idea but the baby put his hand right through the ink pad which caused a big mess. But it's super cute
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: Great frame. I bought it for my newborn. Surprisingly it had a pad for a hand prints (very small though) , i used a tempera paint instead of using a given pad.
customer_reviews.author: Anasko

customer_reviews.title: Transfer carefully
customer_reviews.text: Since it transfers the ink to the paper you have to be very careful as it transfers the lightest touch and you may end up touching it some while trying to help your little ones print transfer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go to baby gift
customer_reviews.text: My go to for baby gifts. Not too cheap, but also something they’ll keep.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and easy
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! I bought two, one for each grandparent set. It was easy to use and happy that it provides two extra practice pieces of paper for the prints.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Quirino

customer_reviews.title: cute!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to display photo of our newborn and his foot/hand print:) cute! It was pretty easy to use, came with instructions and ink pad and a few paper sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliya K

customer_reviews.title: This is so easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy and mess free. My son is 5 months old and I was able to get his foot print and hand print. Now to just print a picture for the frame!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: The 1st one I ordered had the glass broken when I received it. I received the replacement without any problems. The frame is nice and good quality. The ink pad on the other hand it's not that great.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift!
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up to make a mother's day gift. Was very simple to create the prints, and completely mess free. Frame was durable and everything arrived in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Z.

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: cheap ink was dry and didnt imprint well old maybe fram is okay could of done this myself in different frame not worth the money really for a keep sake
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these in the last 2 years and love it I have both of my kids new born pictures in them with their feet when they were only 4 days old willbe buying another one when we have our last one
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: Great for gifts
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 of them for my son’s grandparents. They freaking loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Barboza

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier
customer_reviews.text: I love the frame and the fact that I was able to add a picture of my newborn. I love how easy it was to do my baby’s prints and the fact that I didn’t have to get ink on my baby’s hands or feet. Also the quality of the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Romero

customer_reviews.title: Love this !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great but, I’m going to buy it as a baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: Lily a.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my friends that were expecting a baby and they absolutely loved it
customer_reviews.author: Morales Linette

customer_reviews.title: Great memory maker!
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to do hands on a newborn but it was a great product that I proudly hang in my house to charish my baby’s tiny hands and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Turned out great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and hand and foot prints came out great! It came with a few extra cards in case we messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Felker

customer_reviews.title: Bought multiple times.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Got one for both of my kids when they were born. I took one star off for the second frame missing the two paper sheets. I had to buy another ink set to replace the missing ones in the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Arcanixus

customer_reviews.title: Bad Descrition
customer_reviews.text: Your product came in a Huge Over-Sized Box, it was pretty hilarious actually, only got the ink pad, nothing else!! Maybe you should re-write what your actually really selling here!!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Branson

customer_reviews.title: A third time's a charm!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third frame I have bought! One for each kid I love it so simple a d easy to put up!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Footprint always came smudged
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. It was impossible to get a clear footprint from this item. The footprint always came out smudged and there was nothing I could do to make it clear. This is a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must for parents and grandparents !
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so easy, inexpensive, and great quality ! Bought one for my son last year and one now for my little girl
customer_reviews.author: Mir

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift idea! Made this with my 2 month old. Easy to use just hard to get baby to stay still!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love this frame
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this it comes with everything you need to take the foot/hand print and washes right off your baby's skin no harmful chemical and it looks so nice when it's.done
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, if your baby is smaller than mine
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, if your baby is smaller than mine, 7 months. Her hand wouldn't fit the ink frame and her foot wouldn't fit the ink frame. FYI! Do it early!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict mother of two

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for what I wanted to accomplish!! It made it even easier that the ink doesn’t get on baby’s hands or feet! It took a few tries to get it right but the end result was exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Auna

customer_reviews.title: Frame was broken.
customer_reviews.text: Frame was broken, do I had to return it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Pop !

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Hardest part of this is getting your baby to cooperate. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my new born baby and I absolutely love the fact I can save her little prints. Worth the price, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This was a whole lot easier to do then I thought. I loved this and looks great on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: No ink in middle of pad
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea. However, when it came, there was a spot in the middle of the ink pad that had no ink. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leona Stoltzfus

customer_reviews.title: Broken frame
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son (6 months) who's foot barely fit in the frame but maybe this is because he's a big baby. Would have given this product 5 stars due to its nice packaging and ease of use, but unfortunately the frame that I received was missing a screw that attaches the hanging hook to the frame so now I'm not able to hang the frame as I would have liked to.
customer_reviews.author: Jose p.

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun way to capture a milestone
customer_reviews.text: My son has grown so fast since being born and at 6 weeks I decided to make his hand and foot impression. Easy to use leaves no ink on hands or free fun mess free way to save those tiny hands and feet forever
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great way to preserve those newborn memories!
customer_reviews.text: The frame is really classy and has a timeless look. Looks great in a nursery for now, but will look great in a family room or bedroom as the baby grows up.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It does what it was intended to do. The no mess ink printing is wonderful too!
customer_reviews.author: DTH

customer_reviews.title: Not enough ink to make a good foot/hand impression
customer_reviews.text: Did not come out clear like the pictures. Instructions were backwards and set did not come with a backup. Very hard to use on a newborn who may be fussy, this much should be supplied. Would not recommended or purchase in future. Pay a little more and get a better product.
customer_reviews.author: jaspreet

customer_reviews.title: Inkpad missing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Description of the product as well as the packaging of the frame says that inkpad is included with the frame, but there is no inkpad. I only received the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: Takes a few tries at first but the end result is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I honestly had so much fun doing this! I love it! So pretty!!!
customer_reviews.author: Agustina

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money to capture the moment
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product , excellent one . I have one and gifted one to my frnd
customer_reviews.author: Kavitha

customer_reviews.title: Will buy Again!
customer_reviews.text: Second one we have done. Ease of use is debatable, ur trying to get a foot print of an infant. Good luck. Both purchaed products have been exactly what we wanted. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

product_meta.title: Pearhead Babyprints Newborn Baby Handprint and Footprint Photo Frame Kit and Included Safe For Baby Clean-Touch Ink Pad, Baby Shower or Christmas Gift, White
product_meta.description:
Style:White Babyprint FrameCapture and cherish your little ones prints forever with Pearhead’s babyprints photo frame. This modern white, wooden photo frame includes everything you need to create a personalized keepsake with your newborn baby’s tiny hand prints or feet prints. It includes a clean-touch ink pad ensuring baby’s hands and feet will never touch the ink and two impression cards. Keepsake frame comes in beautiful gift ready packaging. To create an impression, make sure the ink is facing down on the included white cards and press your baby's hand and foot separately onto the clean-touch ink pad. Your baby’s tiny prints will be left on the cards without any ink on baby! Let dry for 1-2 days. Then you can place the prints in the frame along with an adorable 4” x 6” photo of your newborn baby. Any mom is sure to love the gift box packaging and special keepsake frame.The frame has silver details and includes an acid-free beveled mat, adding an elegant touch. “my little prints” is silver foil stamped on the front of the frame. Keepsake frame also includes a sawtooth hanger to easily hang on any wall in your baby’s nursery or around your home. Ink pad is good for two-time use maximum, recommended for newborns only. Ink pads will accommodate hand/feet up to 2.25” wide x 3.5” long. This frame is the perfect baby shower gift for any expecting parents! Keepsake frame will also make a special baptism or christening keepsake and unique thoughtful gift. Now you will always be able to remember how little your baby's piggies were and cherish them with Pearhead’s babyprints photo frame. Product dimensions: 17” W x 9.50” H x .56” D; Photo insert: 4” x 6”.
